author: mholz
msg: Bugfix: Its not the responsibility of a NodeStore to handle the child and binding list
of a ObjectNodes parent. This is the responsibility  of StructureImpl. So clearBindings()
was wrong in deleting a node from its parents binding list.

author: mholz
msg: Store modified parent node before deleting its child. Otherwise in J2EE store
the constraint,that only nodes may be deleted, which are not children, is

author: ozeigermann
msg: - ported all RDBMS adapters to binding
- added graceful handling of constraint violations useful with low isolation levels
